Object.Name: CmdhBackOffParametersSet
Object.Description1: This Object defines set of parameters which can be referenced by a specific Instance of the CmdhNwAccessRule Object (ID: 2055)

Item.Name: NetworkAction
Item.Description: Contains specific action actually attempted on the network (e.g. cellular-registration)

Item.Name: InitialBackoffTime
Item.Description: Regarding the BackOffParameters of a certain CmdhNwAccessRule Object Instance, this Resource contains the value for the Initial wait time.

Item.Name: AdditionalBackoffTime
Item.Description: Regarding the BackOffParameters of a certain CmdhNwAccessRule Object Instance, this Resource contains the value for an additional wait tme.

Item.Name: MaximumBackoffTime
Item.Description: Regarding the BackOffParameters of a certain CmdhNwAccessRule Object Instance, this Resource contains the value for the maximum wait time

Item.Name: OptionalRandomBackoffTime
Item.Description: Regarding the BackOffParameters of a certain CmdhNwAccessRule Object Instance, this Resource contains the value for an optional random wait time.
